channel.title: My idea's
channel.description:
Hello Moparians :P , I got some nice idea's that the new Admin : Taharok can add ;) ,
My idea's : - New Forum board (vBulletin,IPBoard...) or a new custom SMF theme. - A profile option for your Runescape name , so people will easier know your Runescape Name. - A homepage - In the Navbar adding Status page tab - Adding some tools for RSPS's - A full graphic section.. About Showcase, Requests,Competitions,Stock&Renders.... - ( Adding a new custom 404 error , this one sucks if you see it 2years)
This are some idea's... Hope you like them.

item.title: My idea's
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Other than the status page suggestion, the rest of these have been talked down. There’s been no other staff support for this topic, so I’m going to mark it as resolved. The status page tab isn’t a terrible idea, so feel free to post another topic about it if you want to exclusively discuss it.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:25, topic:443578”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=546257.msg4010458#msg4010458 date=1339132930]

If it showed our runescape name it’d break the tos protecting us from jagflax

tos really dun protect us from anything afaik :o

This website had quite a battle with Jagflex, the tos matters.
[/quote]
moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

A bunch of people (iirc) said that it doesn’t really do anything, and the fact that people who show their name on the “post your character” topic would be breaking the tos and be banned.[/quote]

Yeah, god forbid I use firefox for anything besides Runescape and their social networking links!
Seriously, it’s like a guy who eats at Burger king getting banned from McDonald’s…

Read full topic

item.title: My idea's
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

The staff has discussed and concluded that the RSN profile field addition won’t be added. It’s a significant security risk to those who use it and it could very well lead to blackmarks and even banning of their RuneScape account, depending on the choices of Jagex employees who sometimes visit this website. People should understand the risk when they expose their RSN in the RuneScape discussion section, but it’s much more difficult to express such warning to those who use a profile field. Furthermore, the field would cover thousands of more posts than the RS discussion images do, and therefore present even higher risk.

Hopefully this all makes sense.

Read full topic

item.title: My idea's
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“IrcdScape, post:1, topic:443578”]Hello Moparians ,
I got some nice idea’s that the new Admin : Taharok can add ,

My idea’s :

  • New Forum board (vBulletin,IPBoard…) or a new custom SMF theme.
  • A profile option for your Runescape name , so people will easier know your Runescape Name.
  • A homepage
  • In the Navbar adding Status page tab
  • Adding some tools for RSPS’s
  • A full graphic section… About Showcase, Requests,Competitions,Stock&Renders…
  • ( Adding a new custom 404 error , this one sucks if you see it 2years)

This are some idea’s… Hope you like them.[/quote]

Themes are being considered I think
No, ToS issues.
www.moparisthebest.com
No point, you can easily find it already.
People make these tools already, as crappy as they may be.
We have a graphics sections which relates to everything… graphical… and non-RSPS.
There’s nothing wrong with the 404. You rarely see it anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: My idea's
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:12, topic:443578”]-We do have several SMF themes right now. Mopar’s conditions for having new themes are pretty straightforward. If you build one that’s compatible and liked by the community, he’ll install it.
-I don’t think this is a particularly needed feature. People have their own ways of sharing their RSNs. No need for a profile field.
-What would our homepage contain? There were many ideas for the MITB homepage, but those have yet to go anywhere. Without an actual need for one, I don’t really understand why one should be added.
-This isn’t a terrible idea. I figured most people have the serverstatus page bookmarked or something. Otherwise, there’s already the redirection board.
-I’m not sure I understand this point. What sort of tools do you mean?
-We just added a new graphics section today.
-I do have to definitely say no to a new 404 page, though. I’m rather fond of the old one. ;D

Hope this helps.[/quote]

I believe the tools he is leaning towards are things such as webclient makers.

Read full topic

item.title: My idea's
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

-We do have several SMF themes right now. Mopar’s conditions for having new themes are pretty straightforward. If you build one that’s compatible and liked by the community, he’ll install it.
-I don’t think this is a particularly needed feature. People have their own ways of sharing their RSNs. No need for a profile field.
-What would our homepage contain? There were many ideas for the MITB homepage, but those have yet to go anywhere. Without an actual need for one, I don’t really understand why one should be added.
-This isn’t a terrible idea. I figured most people have the serverstatus page bookmarked or something. Otherwise, there’s already the redirection board.
-I’m not sure I understand this point. What sort of tools do you mean?
-We just added a new graphics section today.
-I do have to definitely say no to a new 404 page, though. I’m rather fond of the old one. ;D

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
